title: The Board of CIDOB proposes Josep Borrell for the presidency of the institution | CIDOB
snippet: The Board of CIDOB, meeting in an ordinary session this morning, has proposed Josep Borrell Fontelles, High Representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and Vice-President of the Commission (2019-2024), to assume the presidency of CIDOB, once the term of office ...

title: Josep Borrell
snippet: Josep Borrell is Senior Distinguished Fellow at the Elcano Royal Institute, and president of CIDOB (Barcelona Centre for International Affairs).

title: Borrell debuts as President of the CIDOB think tank
snippet: Josep Borrell took office this Wednesday as president of CIDOB, the think tank specializing in international relations.
